Clumpy API¶

This is the full API documentation of the clumpy toolbox.

clumpy.definition: Definition¶

Elements definition

State¶

definition.State(label, value, color)

Define a land use state.

definition.Palette([states])

Define a palette, i.e. a set of states.

Layer¶

definition.LandUseCoverLayer([label, time, …])

Define a Land Use Cover (LUC) layer.

definition.FeatureLayer([label, time, path, …])

Define a feature layer.

clumpy.definition: Scenario¶

Scenario module.

Transition Matrix¶

scenario.TransitionMatrix(M[, palette_u, …])

Define a transition matrix.

scenario.compute_transition_matrix(V_u, …)

Compute the transition matrix from final states vectors.

scenario.load_transition_matrix(path, palette)

Load transition matrixes according to a given palette.

clumpy.density_estimation: Density Estimation¶

Density Estimation Methods

density_estimation.GKDE([h, …])

Gaussian Kernel Density Estimator.

density_estimation.Parameters([method])

Density Estimators Parameters.

clumpy.models: Models¶

Models

Parameters¶

model parameters

models.parameters.Patches([isl_patch, …])

Patches parameters object.

models.parameters.BootstrapPatch(areas, …)

Bootstrap patch parameters object.

models.parameters.Transitions(features[, …])

Transitions parameters used by module classes.

models.parameters.Region(transition_matrix)

Region parameters.

Models functions¶

models.allocation(luc_initial, luc_final, …)

Allocation function according to regions parameters.
